text: Nemanja Calasan (born 24 November 1985) is a Serbian professional basketball player who currently plays for the Starwings Basel club of the Swiss Basketball League. Before he joined the Starwings, he played professionally for other teams in Switzerland, Greece, Romania and France.Die Starwings verpflichten mit Nemanja Calasan ihren Wunschcenter Georges Küng (BZ Basel), 20 July 2017. Accessed 4 September 2018. In 2018, he was the leading scorer of the Swiss Basketball League. Nemanja Calasan ist Mobiliar Topscorer von Starwings Basket Regio Basel Nina von Siebenthal (Aargauer Zeitung), 8 April 2018. Accessed 4 September 2018. ==Personal== His parents were refugees who fled from modern-day Croatia when Nemanja Calasan was a child.Violence at home troubles Calasan Curt Rallo (SouthBendTribune.com), 27 February 2008. title: Nemanja Calasan
